data.name: Business Intelligence 3.0: AI and the Future of Business Analytics
data.summary:
How cloud-based Unified Data Analytics Platforms are replacing traditional data Warehouses
How autonomous, predictive, and prescriptive insights assist decision-makers in making better, faster decisions.
How non-technical business users are now making data-driven decisions without IT or analysts involved
data.speakers:
Prem Kiran, Founder, Hypersonix
Todd P. Michaud, President and Chief Customer Officer, Hypersonix
